basics.name: Rodrigo Pozo
basics.label: Electrical Engineer
basics.summary: I am an Electrical Engineer with a Master's degree in Engineering Sciences. I am currently working as a Data Scientist and have a strong background in  machine learning, signal processing, and data analysis.

work.name: Manglar Labs SpA.
work.summary: I was responsible for the requirements gathering for Internet of Things (IoT) systems, with a particular focus on satellite communication. I evaluated a satellite communication module, conducting various tests such as energy consumption measurement, designing a use case for the livestock sector, and conducting field tests. I also drafted a technical report summarizing the results and conclusions.
highlights: Designed a use case for the livestock sector

work.name: Madeco by Nexans
work.summary: I performed preventive maintenance on electrical machinery and production lines at the Madeco by Nexans factory, with a specialization in electrical maintenance. My responsibilities included maintaining and calibrating electrical panels, implementing cleaning protocols, and inspecting motors and instrumentation.
highlights: Performed preventive maintenance on electrical machinery and production lines

volunteer.summary: I participated in a volunteer program that focused on building tools to help alleviate poverty, such as pig pens, greenhouses, chicken coops, and clay ovens, for low-income families in the Araucanía Region. This initiative involved a team of 180 volunteers from various professions and universities.
highlights: Built tools to help alleviate poverty
Worked with a team of 180 volunteers

education.summary: My master's thesis focused on using generative neural network models (GANS, VAEs, Diffusion Models, Transformers) to study computational creativity in audio and music.
highlights: Studied computational creativity in audio and music
Used generative neural network models (GANS, VAEs, Diffusion Models, Transformers)

education.summary: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering with a specialization in programming. My studies have focused on topics such as circuit analysis, electromagnetism, power systems, and control systems.
highlights: Focus on circuit analysis, electromagnetism, power systems, and control systems
